channel.title: Ags help, gfx is different =o
channel.description: hello, I am making a 317, it's a PI server so that'll help you figure out my problem... Any ways I was on today I was checking out all the items like to see if their was ags, claws, that kind of stuff.. Any ways I spawned the ags and it came out to look like a blurite sword that is gray. Also its shown the same way in the player inventory... So my question is what file can I fix it in maybe a class file of some sort. do I call sprite 11694 to get the godsword sprite I want i dont mean ::item i mean calling sprites. It has special, and all the other godsword's have their sprite correctly... Also another thing when you dismantle the godsword the hilt and blade look like the actually godsword so when I use them on each other they should combine but they don't. So if you could help me with this it would be a life saver... I will be on here again soon because I also have to add claws. Thanks!

item.title: Ags help, gfx is different =o
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:7, topic:371408”][quote author=bello33 link=topic=467497.msg3418360#msg3418360 date=1291306283]

If they are named “Armadyl Godsword” But the sprites are Blurite Swords,

Then that is a client sided issue,

Whoever made that may of overwrote the sprites for the Godswords, etc.

do you mean models?
[/quote]

No i mean sprites, unless the models are also incorrect.[/quote]I don’t understand what you meant, but the godsword hits like a regular godsword and the spec works too, its just how it looks that different.

Read full topic

item.title: Ags help, gfx is different =o
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“bello33, post:4, topic:371408”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=467497.msg3418339#msg3418339 date=1291303165]
If they are named “Armadyl Godsword” But the sprites are Blurite Swords,

Then that is a client sided issue,

Whoever made that may of overwrote the sprites for the Godswords, etc.
[/quote]

do you mean models?[/quote]

No i mean sprites,

But I guess looking at the picture, the models are incorrect as well.

Probably more efficient just to re-add Godswords.

Read full topic

item.title: Ags help, gfx is different =o
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“x sam x, post:5, topic:371408”]it is client sided, either you need to add the models or change the ints.[/quote]Guys look I’ll post a picture, and just tell me what to do so i can fix it please. I did use code 11694 so it shouldn’t like look it does. I want it to look like a gs like all the other ones, also it is named armadyl godsword. 1 more thing, the spec works perfectly! So I think the sprite was overridden.
click on the pciture to make it bigger, this is the picture:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

it is client sided, either you need to add the models or change the ints.

Read full topic

item.title: Ags help, gfx is different =o
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

hello, I am making a 317, it’s a PI server so that’ll help you figure out my problem… Any ways I was on today I was checking out all the items like to see if their was ags, claws, that kind of stuff… Any ways I spawned the ags and it came out to look like a blurite sword that is gray. Also its shown the same way in the player inventory… So my question is what file can I fix it in maybe a class file of some sort. do I call sprite 11694 to get the godsword sprite I want i dont mean ::item i mean calling sprites. It has special, and all the other godsword’s have their sprite correctly… Also another thing when you dismantle the godsword the hilt and blade look like the actually godsword so when I use them on each other they should combine but they don’t. So if you could help me with this it would be a life saver… I will be on here again soon because I also have to add claws.
Thanks!
